haha blue eye space go die

Wow someone is actually reading this. Congratulations you have exceeded my expectations on how many views this is going to get. Now you may be asking why I would write a review on a game that is over 10 years old and popular enough that most everyone will buy it without reading a review. The answer is simple: I like the game. The story is amazing and the puzzles are perfect. Even the multiplayer was almost as great as the single player, which is hard to come by nowadays. There really isn't much more to ask from a game like this (besides more levels or story). Overall, portal 2 is very unique and one of the greatest games I've played. Definitely worth the money, especially if it is on sale.
